title: Hot steak mince chilli
ingredients: ['2 peppers, chopped', '10 to 15 mushrooms, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', '500g lean beef mince', '2 beef stock cubes', '600ml (1 pt) hot water', '2 teaspoons cracked black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons mild garam masala', '3 tablespoons hot chilli powder', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '3 tablespoons honey']
